messages.content: in british columbia, if i am involved in a vehicle accident with another driver, what information am i required to provide to the other driver?

If I am involved in a car accident in British Columbia, I am required to provide my insurance information to the other driver. I am also required to notify the other driver if either I or my passenger has any injuries as a result of the accident.
